
describe-load-based-auto-scaling
********************************


DESCRIPTION
===========

Describes load-based auto scaling configurations for specified layers.


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws opsworks describe-load-based-auto-scaling
     [--layer-ids <value>]


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

None


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

"--layer-ids"  (list of string)
   An array of layer IDs.

   *Parameter Syntax*

      ["string", ...]
